body:
# Sen's page

## Personal Projects

## OpenGL Experiments

## SenOGL

[Repository](https://github.com/Senryoku/SenOGL)

### University projects

#### [Cyaprana](http://cyaprana.chez.com/)

Video analysis (3D tracking) with OpenCV, data coming from up to 5 cameras.

#### [Jump'n'run](https://github.com/Senryoku/jump-n-run)

Done in team with [Posva](https://github.com/posva) during the 2st year of college. We both touched pretty much every piece of the program, but I mostly worked on the physics engine and the level editor.
![JumpNRun](http://i.imgur.com/8tuFG.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
